text.text: Encrypt/decrypt with the Mule Secure Properties Tool
From Slack encrypt or decrypt values using an instance of the <https://docs.mulesoft.com/mule-runtime/4.4/secure-configuration-properties#secure_props_tool|Mule Secure Properties Tool>.
The encryption key must always be of a size supported by the alogithm. For example, 16 characters (such as `theEncryptionKey`) for `AES`.

*Encrypt a string*:
With global shortcut `{encryptGlobalShortcut}`
or slash command `{encryptSlashCommand}`, for example ```{encryptSlashCommand} AES CBC theEncryptionKey thisIsTheValueToEncrypt true```

*Decrypt an encrypted string*:
With global shortcut `{decryptGlobalShortcut}`
or slash command `{decryptSlashCommand}`, for example ```{decryptSlashCommand} AES CBC theEncryptionKey xi0sBSrryonNa6wXdi5bhW5iTJDdvyfr5YV96NXwneVwQPyf0JRCnRHG1syuGp0b true```
